TextView.android:text: 1)Look at this series: 2, 1, (1/2), (1/4), ... What number should come next?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n This is a simple division series; each number is one-half of the previous number. \n In other terms to say, the number is divided by 2 successively to get the next result.
2)Look at this series: 7, 10, 8, 11, 9, 12, ... What number should come next?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n This is a simple alternating addition and subtraction series.\n In the first pattern, 3 is added; in the second, 2 is subtracted.
3)Look at this series: 36, 34, 30, 28, 24, ... What number should come next?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n This is an alternating number subtraction series.\n First, 2 is subtracted, then 4, then 2, and so on.
4)Look at this series: 22, 21, 23, 22, 24, 23, ... What number should come next?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n In this simple alternating subtraction and addition series; 1 is subtracted, then 2 is added, and so on.
5)Look at this series: 53, 53, 40, 40, 27, 27, ... What number should come next?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation:In this series, each number is repeated, then 13 is subtracted to arrive at the next number.
6)Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next. 28 25 5 21 18 5 14
View Answer

Answer : Option A \n Explanation: This is an alternating subtraction series with the interpolation of a random number, 5, as every third number.\n In the subtraction series, 3 is subtracted, then 4, then 3, and so on.
View Answer

Answer : Option B 
 Explanation: This is an alternating addition series, with a random number, 21, interpolated as every third number.
 The addition series alternates between adding 3 and adding 4. 
 The number 21 appears after each number arrived at by adding 3.
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:Here is a simple addition series, which begins with 9 and adds 7.

Answer : Option B \n Explanation:This is a simple addition series, which begins with 2 and adds 6.
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n Explanation: In this alternating repetition series, a random number, 33, is interpolated every third number into a simple addition series,\n in which each number increases by 2.
11)Look at this series: F2, __, D8, C16, B32, ... What number should fill the blank
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n The letters decrease by 1; the numbers are multiplied by 2.
12)Look at this series: 664, 332, 340, 170, ____, 89, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n This is an alternating division and addition series: First, divide by 2, and then add 8.
13)Look at this series: V, VIII, XI, XIV, __, XX, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n This is a simple addition series; each number is 3 more than the previous number.
14)Look at this series: 70, 71, 76, __, 81, 86, 70, 91, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n In this series, 5 is added to the previous number; the number 70 is inserted as every third number.
15)Look at this series: 8, 43, 11, 41, __, 39, 17, ... What number should fill in the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n This is a simple alternating addition and subtraction series. The first series begins with 8 and adds 3; the second begins with 43 and subtracts 2.
16)Look at this series: VI, 10, V, 11, __, 12, III, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer

Answer : Option B \n This is an alternating addition and subtraction series. Roman numbers alternate with Arabic numbers. In the Roman numeral pattern, each number decreases by 1. In the Arabic numeral pattern, each number increases by 1.
17)Look at this series: (1/9), (1/3), 1, ____ , 9, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n This is a multiplication series; each number is 3 times the previous number.
18)Look at this series: 83, 73, 93, 63, __, 93, 43, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer

Answer : Option B \n This is a simple subtraction series in which a random number, 93, is interpolated as every third number. In the subtraction series, 10 is subtracted from each number to arrive at the next.
19)Look at this series: 15, __, 27, 27, 39, 39, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n In this simple addition with repetition series, each number in the series repeats itself, and then increases by 12 to arrive at the next number.
20)Look at this series: 72, 76, 73, 77, 74, __, 75, ... What number should fill the blank?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n This series alternates the addition of 4 with the subtraction of 3.
